input.sentences: we had a great time this weekend
the fireman showed how to do thier job
there are so many color houses
in the end everyone was happy
output.sentences: Over the weekend I had some extra time so i went exploring.
The first exciting thing I found was some firemen doing their job putting out a fire.
i kept driving  and came upon a pretty village on the coast.
The pastel color of the houses looked like something out of a fairtale.
I ended my exploration on a happy note at a small petting zoo.
